verses.verse: And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> in the hills, <S%H2022><s%> and in the valleys, <S%H8219><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the coasts <S%H2348><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> over <S%H413><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite, <S%H2983><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> thereof;

That they gathered themselves <S%H6908><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> and with <S%H5973><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> accord. <S%H6310><s%>

And when the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> unto Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and to Ai, <S%H5857><s%>

They <S%H1992><s%> did work <S%H6213><s%> wilily, <S%H6195><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> and made as if they had been ambassadors, <S%H6737><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> old <S%H1087><s%> sacks <S%H8242><s%> upon their asses, <S%H2543><s%> and wine <S%H3196><s%> bottles, <S%H4997><s%> old, <S%H1087><s%> and rent, <S%H1234><s%> and bound up; <S%H6887><s%>

And old <S%H1087><s%> shoes <S%H5275><s%> and clouted <S%H2921><s%> upon their feet, <S%H7272><s%> and old <S%H1087><s%> garments <S%H8008><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them; and all <S%H3605><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of their provision <S%H6718><s%> was dry <S%H3001><s%> and moldy. <S%H5350><s%>

And they went <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> at Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, and to <S%H413><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> We be come <S%H935><s%> from a far country: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H7350><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore make <S%H3772><s%> ye a league <S%H1285><s%> with us.

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> Peradventure <S%H194><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> us; and how <S%H349><s%> shall we make <S%H3772><s%> a league <S%H1285><s%> with you?

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> We <S%H587><s%> are thy servants. <S%H5650><s%> And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Who <S%H4310><s%> are ye? <S%H859><s%> and from whence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H370><s%> come <S%H935><s%> ye?

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, From a very far country <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H7350><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> because of the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God: <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> we have heard <S%H8085><s%> the fame <S%H8089><s%> of him, and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> to the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and to Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was at Ashtaroth. <S%H6252><s%>

Wherefore our elders <S%H2205><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of our country <S%H776><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> us, saying, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> victuals <S%H6720><s%> with you <S%H3027><s%> for the journey, <S%H1870><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> them, and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, We <S%H587><s%> are your servants: <S%H5650><s%> therefore now <S%H6258><s%> make <S%H3772><s%> ye a league <S%H1285><s%> with us.

This <S%H2088><s%> our bread <S%H3899><s%> we took hot <S%H2525><s%> for our provision <S%H6679><s%> out of our houses <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> we came forth <S%H3318><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you; but now, <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is dry, <S%H3001><s%> and it is <S%H1961><s%> moldy: <S%H5350><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> bottles <S%H4997><s%> of wine, <S%H3196><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we filled, <S%H4390><s%> were new; <S%H2319><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> they be rent: <S%H1234><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> our garments <S%H8008><s%> and our shoes <S%H5275><s%> are become old <S%H1086><s%> by reason of the very <S%H3966><s%> long <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7230><s%> journey. <S%H1870><s%>
And the men <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> of their victuals, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6718><s%> and asked <S%H7592><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> counsel at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> with them, and made <S%H6213><s%> a league <S%H1285><s%> with them, to let them live: <S%H2421><s%> and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto them.

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> at the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> after <S%H310><s%> <S%H834><s%> they had made <S%H3772><s%> a league <S%H1285><s%> with them, that they heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> were their <S%H413><s%> neighbors, <S%H7138><s%> and that they <S%H1992><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed, <S%H5265><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> their cities <S%H5892><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> Now their cities <S%H5892><s%> were Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%> and Chephirah, <S%H3716><s%> and Beeroth, <S%H881><s%> and Kirjath-jearim. <S%H7157><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> them not, <S%H3808><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto them by the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the princes. <S%H5387><s%>

But all <S%H3605><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> We <S%H587><s%> have sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto them by the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore we may <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> them.

This <S%H2063><s%> we will do <S%H6213><s%> to them; we will even let them live, <S%H2421><s%> <S%H853><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> us, because of <S%H5921><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we swore <S%H7650><s%> unto them.

And the princes <S%H5387><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Let them live; <S%H2421><s%> but let them be <S%H1961><s%> hewers <S%H2404><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation; <S%H5712><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> had promised <S%H1696><s%> them.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for them, and he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> have ye beguiled <S%H7411><s%> us, saying, <S%H559><s%> We <S%H587><s%> are very <S%H3966><s%> far <S%H7350><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> you; when ye <S%H859><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> us?

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore ye <S%H859><s%> are cursed, <S%H779><s%> and there shall none <S%H3808><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> you be freed <S%H3772><s%> from being bondmen, <S%H5650><s%> and hewers <S%H2404><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of my God. <S%H430><s%>

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> it was certainly told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H5046><s%> thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> <S%H853><s%> how that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you all <S%H3605><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and to destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, therefore we were sore <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> of our lives <S%H5315><s%> because of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing. <S%H1697><s%>

And now, <S%H6258><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> we are in thine hand: <S%H3027><s%> as it seemeth good <S%H2896><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> unto thee <S%H5869><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> unto us, do. <S%H6213><s%>

And so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> he unto them, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they slew <S%H2026><s%> them not. <S%H3808><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> them that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> hewers <S%H2404><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> and drawers <S%H7579><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> for the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> and for the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> in <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he should choose. <S%H977><s%>
